author: delos
msg: GERONIMODEVTOOLS-594 Geronimo server can't be deleted when it has been stopped in GEP.

author: hiranya
msg: Refactored and improved the tasks code

author: hiranya
msg: Refactored and improved the code for tasks
* Removed the singleton pattern in the SynapseTaskManager

* SynapseConfiguration is used to store the SynapseTaskManager object and share it among modules (all modules should look to get the SynapseTaskManager from the SynapseConfiguration. If it is not there it should be considered an error) - This guarantees proper initialization and clean up in all environments, including OSGi platforms
* Proper initialization of the task manager at Axis2SynapseController
